ocremixupdater
Class MP3DownloaderThread

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.Object,java.lang.String>
      ocremixupdater.MP3DownloaderThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Object>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<java.lang.Object>
public class MP3DownloaderThread
extends javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.Object,java.lang.String>

A SwingWorker thread that downloads ReMixes.

It attempts to download the remix with the name it already has, but if the mirror returns an error page, it checks the ReMix's own page at ocremix.org to find the correct file name, and then downloads that.

It repeats this process for each ReMix in the database marked as "get", beginning with the lowest numbered one.

downloadMP3

public int downloadMP3(OCReMix mix)
                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Download an mp3 from a random mirror, saving it to file.

Parameters:
mix - The file name of the ReMix to attempt download of.
Returns:
One of the MP3DownloaderThread.MP3_RESULT_ values, showing whether the download succeeded or failed in various ways.
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException - If the user cancelled the download.

fixName

public boolean fixName(OCReMix mix)
If the mp3 download failed in that the mirror returned an error page, check ocremix.org for the correct ReMix name.

Parameters:
mix - The ReMix to update the name of.
Returns:
Whether this succeeded.
